channel.title: Brindlewood Bay: Tercentenary
channel.description:
Brindlewood Bay is a roleplaying game about a group of elderly women— members of the local Murder Mavens mystery book club—who frequently find themselves investigating (and solving!) real-life murder mysteries.
It's the 300th anniversary of the official incorporation of their beloved village, so there's a horse of tourists flocking to Brindlewood Bay, and the ladies will have their hands full getting to the bottom of the grisly crimes happening amidst the hubbub.
CW: Murder, crime scenes, peril to elders. We'll use safety tools including Lines & Veils, X-Card/Script Change, and Open Door to make sure everyone has a scary fun time.
Each session will be a mystery that ties into a larger series, so it'll be the most fun if you can attend all 4 sessions, but it's not required. Note that there are 3 open slots but we will have 4 players as one space is reserved for the player who requested this series.
